text: Deelaa laa, dei di hai geegee i mehanga digau tuadimee mo digau o Jew ai, be i mehanga nia daane gu sirkumsais mo digi sirkumsais, mouli llamu dauwa de iloo namua mo mouli iloo madammaa dolomeenei, digau hege mo digau moholo, gei Christ la hua go nia mee huogodoo. Christ la i lodo nia mee huogodoo.
